attributes.action: Prevent Boris Johnson, Micheal Gove and Nigel Farage from holding public office.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farages verbal admission that £350 million claim was not correct.
attributes.background: Of the five nations voting to leave or remain in the European Union only two voted to leave (England and Wales). They did so on incorrect, over hyped information which preyed on people's fears. These tatics prevented rational debate all in the cause of winning.
